review: For what I need, this works.
author: DENNIS DANGELO

review: I bought this to see if it would be a useful gadget to get material from my cell phone and computer onto the big screen. It worked so well that I have purchased 2 more units. It works as advertised, plus there are apps that enhance the useful of it.
author: Stephen Skinner

review: Excelent product, as alwasys google being the beast.
author: Diego Rodriguez

review: Flawless, used on a new 40 in tv and shows great quality picture, used mainly for netflix, was also able to claim some google offers with it.
author: MrKidMonkey

review: This little guys is awesome...beside using your phone get the chrome browser on your PC or laptop and stream from that as well.
author: Wayne Bartrum

review: I'll give it three stars. The streaming function is awesome, but I would have loved to know, that it's only compatible with certain devices. The reason for my purchase was to stream videos from my kindle. It just doesn't work that way. You're better off getting the Kindle fire stick.
author: Oscar Padilla

review: Love my Chromecast.I don't have cable, don't want it. Commercials drive me insane.But I do have Netflix, HBOgo, and HuluPlus,  Being able to control my TV from my phone is the greatest!  Never have to search for the remote!I just wish that CBS would make a Chromecast friendly app...
author: Issa
